mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kb_entry(id,title, reporter,board_id,order_number) VALUES (#{id},#{title}, #{reporter},#{boardId},(SELECT max_order_number from (SELECT CASE WHEN max(order_number) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE max(order_number)+1 end as max_order_number FROM kb_entry WHERE board_id=#{boardId} ) as t ))
mapper.update: UPDATE kb_entry SET title=#{title}, order_number=#{orderNumber} WHERE id=#{id} AND delete_status=0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM kb_entry WHERE delete_status=0 AND board_id=#{boardId} ORDER BY order_number
SELECT * FROM kb_entry WHERE delete_status=0 and id= #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE kb_entry SET delete_status=1 WHERE id=#{id}
